1110001011011110 1101010001010010 1 -> sum: 1011011100110001, cout: 1
0101001101101111 1111000100011000 0 -> sum: 0100010010000111, cout: 1
1111100110010100 0011100010101100 1 -> sum: 0011001001000001, cout: 1
1011000000011011 0100010000010001 1 -> sum: 1111010000101101, cout: 0
0010000110000110 0000110110000111 1 -> sum: 0010111100001110, cout: 0
1000010000110010 0010010111000001 0 -> sum: 1010100111110011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
